trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of parameters relevant to an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> as well as their respective mappings to columns in a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示与相关的参数集合<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref>以及到中的列及其相应映射<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: When using named parameters, the number of parameters in the collection must be equal to the number of named parameters within the command text, or the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle raises an error.
trans-unit.target: 当使用命名参数时，集合中的参数的数量必须等于命令文本中的命名参数的数目或适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`.
trans-unit.target: 将参数传递给 SQL 语句调用的适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持的问号 （？） 占位符<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>的`CommandType.Text`。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: In this case, named parameters must be used.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，必须使用命名的参数。

trans-unit.source: For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: 例如︰``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ```由使用名为 SQL 语句中的参数的调用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>的`CommandType.Text`，你必须在参数名称后的加冒号 （:） 字符前面。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter> objects to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A> property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: 但是，在存储过程中，或在其他位置中你的代码的命名参数引用时 (例如，当添加<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>对象添加到<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A>属性)，不要在前面添加冒号 （:） 的命名的参数。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter>

trans-unit.source: The data provider supplies the colon automatically.
trans-unit.target: 数据提供程序会自动提供冒号。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> given the parameter name and value.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref>到<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref>给定参数名称和值。

trans-unit.source: Use caution when using this overload of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection.Add%2A> method to specify integer parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载时要格外小心<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection.Add%2A>方法，以指定整数参数值。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because this overload takes a `value` of type <xref:System.Object>, you must convert the integral value to an <xref:System.Object> type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates.
trans-unit.target: 因为此重载接受`value`类型的<xref:System.Object>，必须将转换到的整数值<xref:System.Object>键入时的值为零，如下面的 C# 示例所示。</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: ``` parameters.Add("pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler will assume you are attempting to call the `OracleParameterCollection.Add` (`string`, `OracleType`) overload.
trans-unit.target: ``` parameters.Add("pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ```如果不执行此转换，则编译器将假定你尝试调用`OracleParameterCollection.Add`(`string`， `OracleType`) 重载。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> is read only, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> is synchronized.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection"></xref> is synchronized, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
